timeline.bodyText: givenName really only applies to things with a PersonName (OpenMRS) or HumanName (FHIR). This should just be called name, i.e., it gets called "givenName" to distinguish it from "familyName" (it makes a bit more sense in French where they're, respectively, "prénom" and "nom"). Very European-parochial.
